sections.description: Application components

Global styles that should be applied to the whole system.
Usually applied to the <html> and <body> tags.
Also if using shadow-root apply it to its root element.
Button element that represents a primary action in the application.
Button element that represents a secondary action in the application. A button with a transparent background.
Styles body text's font and color properties.

Can even add a border to the grid.
